channel.title: ai on Leonardo Borges
channel.description: Recent content in ai on Leonardo Borges

item.title: Classifier Evaluation
item.description: I recently wrote an article on our company blog where I explained how we evaluate Machine Learning models at RecordPoint – if you haven’t read it yet, I’d recommend you do so before proceeding. Since its publishing, I received a number of comments asking me to clarify the concepts presented with concrete examples. The original article is light on code by design as the audience for the company blog isn’t always that technical.
